additional_info:
Telephone, Generator, Heating system: central, gas, electricity, Hot water: gas, electricity 
 A large newly built and under renovation apartment located in the very center of Tbilisi, district of Vera (27 Tarkhnishvili Street, 3rd floor, just across the Chinese Embassy) is now for rent. The apartment with 110 sq. meters is in a so called “white frame” condition (i.e., walls are patched with cement mortar, and gas, water, sewage, ventilation and heating pipes as well as electricity and communication cables are installed). It has four rooms as well as two bathrooms, kitchen, corridor, balcony (16 sq. meters) and a garage (36 sq. meters fitting two cars) and can be used both as living and office space. The rent conditions are the following: if the renter agrees to finish the renovation of this apartment (finishing costs are estimated at around GEL 15,000), he/she will be exempted from paying the rental until the renovation costs are fully paid, and plus 3 months more.

details.address: Tbilisi, Old Tbilisi,  Vera, Tarkhnishvili st.
